channel.title: Databases on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Databases on Analyst

item.title: Photos
item.description: Media files are arguably the most reliable evidence you can find and oftentimes contain a wealth of useful informaiton.

item.title: Accounts3
item.description: This database contains additional contact details of the device owner such as email addresses.

item.title: ADDataStore
item.description: *This database contains various device usage statistics. *

item.title: CellularUsage
item.description: This database contains phone numbers and SIM card IDs associated with the device even when the SIM is no longer inserted into the device.

item.title: DataUsage
item.description: This database contains the details of the mobile network traffic usage on the device.

item.title: KnowledgeC
item.description: This article is an attempt to summarise different resources about knowledgeC database and highlight its main forensically valuable information. The database typically includes about one month of records.
